AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 14/ 2009 
 
 
Sub : Security arrangements for Shri Navin B. Chawla, Chief Election Commissioner of 
India: 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 29/2002 dated 24/9/2002, One Armed 
Personal Security Officer of Shri Navin B. Chawla, Chief Election Commissioner of India, is 
permitted to carry his weapon and ammunition on his person or in his hand baggage, while 
accompanying the dignitary on board flight within the country till 31st December 2009. The 
weapon shall be carried in fully unloaded condition i.e weapon and ammunition shall be kept 
separately.
